summary.span: Represents the configurable execution environment provided by the workflow run-time engine for workflows.

span.span: Represents the configurable execution environment provided by the workflow run-time engine for workflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 會公開主應用程式和服務需要的功能以設定和控制工作流程執行階段引擎，以及收到變更工作流程執行階段引擎與其任何工作流程執行個體的通知。 exposes functionality required by a host application and services to configure and control the workflow run-time engine and to be notified of changes to both the workflow run-time engine and any of its workflow instances. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 它提供如何使用 建構函式 (Constructor)、、 和 方法的範例。It provides examples of how to use the constructor and the , , and methods. 程式碼也會顯示在工作流程主機中使用 方法建立 物件的建議方法。The code also shows the recommended way to create a object in a workflow host using the method. 同時也會顯示如何設定 、 和 事件的事件處理常式。It also shows how to set event handlers for the , , and events. 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以預設的屬性值初始化，而且包含預設的核心服務。The is initialized with the default property values and contains the default core services. 若要額外設定工作流程執行階段引擎，您可以使用 和 來加入或移除服務，而且您可以設定 。To additionally configure the workflow run-time engine, you can add and remove services by using and , and you can set . 設定 後，呼叫 以啟動工作流程執行階段引擎及其服務。After the is configured, call to start the workflow run-time engine and its services. 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of class. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"WorkflowRuntime""WorkflowRuntime"| ||`false`| 預設的核心服務有： 和 。The default core services are and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how you can use functionality from a workflow host. 它提供如何使用 建構函式建立 的執行個體，以及存取它的方法和事件的範例。It provides an example of how to use the constructor to create an instance of a and access its methods and events. 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據 在應用程式組態檔中指定之區段中的設定初始化 `configSectionName`。The is initialized according to the settings in the section specified by `configSectionName` in the application configuration file. `configSectionName` 必須對應至有效`workflowSettings`組態檔區段。`configSectionName` must correspond to a valid `workflowSettings` section of a configuration file. 設定工作流程執行階段引擎時使用應用程式組態檔，載入並具現化類別類型中所列的`Services`組態檔區段。When the workflow run-time engine is configured by using an application configuration file, it loads and instantiates classes of the types listed in the `Services` section of the configuration file. 工作流程執行階段引擎建構這些類別時，會依序使用下列特徵標記尋找類別建構函式：When the workflow run-time engine constructs these classes it looks for class constructors with the following signatures in the following order: 1. Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters) 2. Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime) 3. Service(NameValueCollection parameters)Service(NameValueCollection parameters) 4. Service()Service() 所有自組態檔載入的服務類別必須至少實作這些建構函式簽章中的其中一個。All service classes that are loaded from a configuration file must implement at least one of these constructor signatures. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式為不使用應用程式組態檔的主機提供了一個機制，可使用單一呼叫方法來設定工作流程執行階段引擎。This constructor provides a mechanism to configure the workflow run-time engine using a single method call for hosts that do not use an application configuration file. 不使用應用程式組態檔的原因很多。There are many reasons for not using the application configuration file. 主機可能在不允許使用組態檔的環境中執行，例如，基於安全因素而不允許從應用程式組態檔中讀取的受信任環境。A host can run in an environment that does not allow using configuration files; for example, in trusted environments that do not allow reading from the application configuration file for security reasons. 此外，主機可能想要使用專屬的組態機制，例如，主機可能將工作流程執行階段引擎組態設定儲存在 SQL 資料庫中。Also, a host can use a proprietary configuration mechanism; for example, the host can store the workflow run-time engine configuration settings in a SQL database. 工作流程執行階段引擎會載入 包含型別的類別，並將這些類別個體化。The workflow run-time engine loads and instantiates classes of the types contained in . 工作流程執行階段引擎建構這些類別時，會依序使用下列特徵標記尋找類別建構函式：When the workflow run-time engine constructs these classes it looks for class constructors with the following signatures in the following order: 1. Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime, NameValueCollection parameters) 2. Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime)Service(WorkflowRuntime runtime) 3. Service(NameValueCollection parameters)Service(NameValueCollection parameters) 4. Service()Service() 所有在 `settings` 中指定的服務類別必須至少實作這些建構函式簽章中的其中一個。All service classes that are specified in `settings` must implement at least one of these constructor signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以透過加入核心服務來設定工作流程執行階段引擎。You can configure the workflow run-time engine by adding core services. 核心服務是衍生自下列任一服務基底類別 (Base Class) 的服務： 類別、 類別、 類別和 類別。Core services are those that derive from any of the following service base classes: the class, the class, the class, and the class. 核心服務可以只在加入工作流程執行階段引擎不在執行中;也就是說，當是`false`。Core services can only be added when the workflow run-time engine is not running; that is, when is `false`. 也可以當做其他服務的儲存容器使用，其他工作流程或主機上執行的應用程式也可以使用。The can also be used as a storage container for other services that can be used by other workflows or by applications running on a host. 如果您在工作流程執行階段引擎啟動後，加入衍生自 類別的非核心服務，則 會呼叫該服務實作的 方法。If you add a non-core service that derives from the class after the workflow run-time engine has been started, calls the method implemented by that service. > [!NOTE] > 會強制限制不能有兩個屬於相同 的服務加入至 。 enforces the restriction that no two services of the same can be added to the . 然而，您可以加入衍生自相同基底類別的多個服務。However, you can add multiple services that derive from the same base class. 中，只能加入各一個衍生自下列服務基底類別的服務： 類別、 類別和 類別。There can be only one service derived from each of the following service base classes in the : the class, the class, and the class. 如果加入多個衍生自這些類別其中之一的服務 (例如兩個持續性服務)， 會擲回 。If you add multiple services derived from one of these classes, for example two persistence services, throws an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 提供如何使用 方法，將 與 加入工作流程執行階段引擎的範例。It provides example of how to use the method to add an and to the workflow run-time engine. 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)範例。This code example is part of the [Cancelling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 之前，系統會針對它執行驗證。Before the is created, validation is executed on it. 如果發生任何驗證錯誤，就會擲回 。If any validation errors occur, the is thrown. 這對於簡單案例很有用，但是在伺服器環境中，針對每一個啟動過程重新驗證工作流程可能是不必要的額外負荷。This works well for simple scenarios, but in a server environment, revalidating a workflow for every activation might be unnecessary overhead. 如需有關如何停用驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about disabling validation, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在使用 方法的工作流程主機中，以建議的方法建立 物件。The following code example demonstrates the recommended way to create a object in a workflow host using the method. 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 之前，系統會針對它執行驗證。Before the is created, validation is executed on it. 如果發生任何驗證錯誤，就會擲回 。If any validation errors occur, the is thrown. 這對於簡單案例很有用，但是在伺服器環境中，針對每一個啟動過程重新驗證工作流程可能是不必要的額外負荷。This works well for simple scenarios, but in a server environment, revalidating a workflow for every activation might be unnecessary overhead. 如需有關如何停用驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about disabling validation, see . `instanceId` 載入的任何執行中工作流程的工作流程 必須是唯一的。The workflow `instanceId` for any running workflows loaded by the must be unique. 如果傳遞 `instanceId` 以建立工作流程，而且某個執行中的工作流程已在使用該 `instanceId`，則會擲回 。If you pass an `instanceId` to create a workflow and a running workflow is already using that `instanceId`, an is thrown. 如需參數中傳遞的範例`CreateWorkflow`，請參閱[工作流程與參數範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157403)。For an example of passing in parameters to `CreateWorkflow`, see [Workflow with Parameters Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157403). 如需使用在 XML 中定義的規則的範例，請參閱[規則範例 IfElse](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157404)。For an example of using rules defined in XML, see [IfElse with Rules Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157404).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要正常關閉 ，您應該在呼叫 之後呼叫 。To shut down the gracefully, you should only call after you have called . 這是因為，單獨呼叫 方法，會使 變成無法使用的狀態。This is because calling the method alone leaves the in an unusable state. 會透過關閉開啟的檔案控制代碼、資料庫連接等方法釋放執行階段使用的資源，但不會卸載工作流程執行個體、停止服務，或執行 所做的任何其他動作。 frees the resources used by the runtime by closing open file handles, database connections, and so on, but it does not unload workflow instances, stop services, or do any of the other actions that does. 只有當主應用程式必須在記憶體回收行程自動釋放 使用的資源之前進行釋放時，才應該呼叫 。 should be called only when the host application must free the resources used by the before they are automatically freed by the garbage collector. 如需一般資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For general information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何呼叫 物件上的 。The following example demonstrates how to call on a object. 在這個範例中，會從應用程式主要表單的 FormClosing 事件處理常式呼叫 方法。這樣可確保應用程式關閉時，會適當地清理執行階段建立的物件。In this sample, the method is called from the FormClosing event handler for the main form of the application; this ensures that the objects created by the runtime are properly cleaned up when the application shuts down. 這個範例取自[語音應用程式範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157405)。This sample is from the [Speech Application Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157405). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `instanceId` 指定目前不在記憶體中的工作流程執行個體，工作流程執行個體會載入記憶體中並排程執行。If `instanceId` specifies a workflow instance that is not currently in memory, the workflow instance is loaded into memory and scheduled for execution. 例如，在中止工作流程執行個體後，您可以呼叫 ，將工作流程執行個體載回記憶體中。For example, after a workflow instance is aborted, you can call to load the workflow instance back into memory. 在此情況中，持續性服務會將工作流程執行個體的上次保存狀態載入記憶體中。In this case, the last persisted state of the workflow instance is loaded into memory by the persistence service. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範呼叫 `ReloadWorkflow` 方法的 方法。The following code example demonstrates a `ReloadWorkflow` method that calls the method. `ReloadWorkflow` 方法屬於一個較大的類別，該類別的 `Runtime` 屬性可以存取 類別的所有方法、屬性和事件。The `ReloadWorkflow` method is part of a larger class that has a `Runtime` property to access all of the methods, properties, and events of the class. 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157351)範例。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157351) sample. > [!NOTE] > 在範例中，呼叫 是多餘的，因為 和 方法使用相同的內部 Helper 方法將工作流程執行個體載入記憶體中。In the example, the call to is redundant because both the and methods use the same internal helper method to load the workflow instance into memory. remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自 類別的服務可以呼叫 方法，以便通知 事件的訂閱者，在服務的執行期間發生了無法處理的例外狀況。A service that is derived from the class can call the method to inform subscribers to the event that an exception that it was unable to handle occurred during its execution. 您可以訂閱此事件以實作復原機制。You can subscribe to this event to implement a recovery mechanism. 在工作流程執行階段引擎尚未建立工作流程執行個體且發生例外狀況時，會引發此事件。This event is raised when a workflow instance has not been created yet by the workflow run-time engine and an exception occurs. 在此案例中，通知主應用程式發生例外狀況的唯一方法就是引發此事件。In this scenario, the only way to inform a host application that an exception occurred is to raise this event. 然而，工作流程執行階段引擎不會直接加以呼叫。However, the workflow run-time engine does not call this directly. 相反的，工作流程執行階段引擎會傳遞例外狀況到工作流程執行個體，如果沒有執行個體則擲回給呼叫者，在這種情況中，呼叫者實際上是引發此事件的服務。Instead, the workflow run-time engine either delivers an exception to the workflow instance or, if there is no instance, throws back to the caller, which in this case is actually the service that fires this event. 如果建立自己的持續性服務或排程器服務，您必須透過基底 方法。If you create your own persistence or scheduler service, you must implement this event yourself through the base method. 若為 事件，寄件者會包含 ，而 則會包含使用服務的工作流程執行個體 和無法處理的 。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the of the workflow instance that was using the service and the that could not be handled. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 程式碼會使 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnExceptionNotHandled` 的方法) 產生關聯。The code associates with an event handler, a method named `OnExceptionNotHandled`. 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351)。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發叫用事件之後驗證工作流程執行階段引擎的核心服務設定由每個衍生自其服務實作的方法類別而且已設定至`true`。The method raises the event after it has validated the core service configuration of the workflow run-time engine, has invoked the method implemented by each of its services that derive from the class, and has set to `true`. 工作流程執行階段引擎啟動衍生自 類別的服務時，無法保證其順序。而且這些工作流程執行階段引擎服務的其中一些服務，可能需要依賴其中的其他服務所提供的功能，來完成各自的啟動工作。There is no guarantee about the order in which the services that derive from the class are started by the workflow run-time engine, and some of these workflow run-time engine services may depend on functionality supplied by other of these services to complete their startup tasks. 工作流程執行階段引擎服務可以覆寫 方法，以便在 事件引發時，執行需要其他工作流程執行階段引擎服務支援的任何最後啟動工作。Workflow run-time engine services can override the method to perform any final startup tasks that require the support of other workflow run-time engine services when the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352). ## Examples 在下列範例中，會將事件處理常式加入至 的 事件中。In the following example, an event handler is added to the event of the . 在這個範例中，處理常式是列印簡易訊息至主控台的匿名方法。In this example, the handler is an anonymous method that prints a simple message to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會確認有一組有效的核心服務存在，然後啟動任何衍生自 類別的服務。This method verifies that a valid set of core services exists and then starts any services that derive from the class. 必須有一個，每個下列的核心服務的其中之一： 工作流程`CommitWorkBatch`服務衍生自基底類別和排程器服務衍生自基底類別。There must be one and only one of each of the following core services: a workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service derived from the base class and a scheduler service derived from the base class. 如果遺漏一個或兩個這些核心服務，工作流程執行階段引擎提供適當的預設服務：工作流程`CommitWorkBatch`服務和排程器服務。If either or both of these core services are missing, the workflow run-time engine supplies the appropriate default service: for the workflow `CommitWorkBatch` service and for the scheduler service. 持續性服務是選用的服務，而且最多只能有一個持續性服務。A persistence service is optional, but there can be at most only one persistence service present. 驗證服務組態後， 會呼叫所有衍生自 類別之服務上的 。After it has validated the service configuration, calls on all of the services that are derived from the class. 最後，工作流程執行階段引擎會設定 並引發 事件。Finally, the workflow run-time engine sets and raises the event. 工作流程執行階段引擎啟動後，無法加入或移除核心服務。You cannot add or remove core services after the workflow run-time engine is started. 核心服務是衍生自 類別、 類別、 類別和 類別的服務。Core services are services that derive from the class, the class, the class, or the class. 如果您在工作流程執行階段引擎執行時呼叫 ，則不會執行任何動作。If you call while the workflow run-time engine is running, no action is performed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 程式碼在 建立 執行個體，並且在它呼叫 以加入服務到執行階段中後呼叫 。The code calls the after the creates a instance and after it calls to add services to the runtime. 它也會在發生任何其他處理之前呼叫 。It also calls before any other processing occurs. 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346)範例。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157346) sample. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會在叫用以其衍生自 類別的每個服務實作的 方法後，引發 事件。The method raises the event after it has invoked the method implemented by each of its services that derive from the class. 這些工作流程執行階段引擎服務的停止順序不一定，而且這些服務的其中一些服務可能需要保留一些其他服務所依賴的功能，直到其他服務停止為止。There is no guarantee about the order in which these workflow run-time engine services are stopped, and some of these services may need to preserve some functionality that is relied on by other services until they too are stopped. 這類服務可以覆寫 方法，以在引發 事件時執行任何剩餘的關閉邏輯。Such services can override the method to perform any residual shutdown logic when the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352). ## Examples 在下列範例中，會將事件處理常式加入至 的 事件中。In the following example, an event handler is added to the event of the . 在這個範例中，處理常式是列印簡易訊息至主控台的匿名方法。In this example, the handler is an anonymous method that prints a simple message to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行個體可能基於多個原因而保存。The workflow instance can be persisted for many reasons. 例如，主機可能呼叫工作流程執行個體上的 。或者已完成不可部分完成的範圍，或執行個體已成為閒置狀態時，工作流程執行階段引擎可能會保存工作流程執行個體。For example, the host can call on a workflow instance, or the workflow run-time engine can persist a workflow instance because the instance is idle or because an atomic scope has completed. 如果 中有持續性服務，則在工作流程執行個體的狀態儲存到記憶體之後，執行階段會引發 。If a persistence service is present in the , is raised by the runtime after the state of the workflow instance is saved to memory. 如果沒有持續性服務存在，仍然會引發事件，但不會儲存執行個體狀態。If a persistence service is not present, the event is still raised but the instance state is not saved. 如果因為正在卸載工作流程執行個體而發生 事件，接著會發生 事件。If the event occurs because the workflow instance is being unloaded, it is followed by a event. 對於 事件，傳送者會包含 ，而 則包含事件關聯的 。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the associated with the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how you can use functionality from a workflow host. 此程式碼會使 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowPersisted` 的方法) 產生關聯。The code associates the with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowPersisted`. 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=15735)。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=15735). remarks.format: ## Remarks 發生未處理的例外狀況時，工作流程可以由主機呼叫 方法、藉由 活動，或由工作流程執行階段引擎加以結束。The workflow can be terminated by the host through a call to the method, by a activity, or by the workflow run-time engine when an unhandled exception occurs. 工作流程執行階段會在工作流程執行個體結束後，但是在它於記憶體中失效之前引發 事件。The workflow run-time engine raises the event after the workflow instance is terminated, but before it is invalidated in memory. 若為 事件，寄件者會包含 ，而且 會包含 和 屬性中執行個體結束原因的相關資訊。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the and information about the reason the instance was terminated in the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 此程式碼會使 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowCompleted` 的方法) 產生關聯。The code associates the with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowCompleted`. 這個程式碼範例屬於[取消工作流程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346)範例。This code example is part of the [Canceling a Workflow](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157346) sample. summary.span: Occurs when the workflow instance is unloaded from memory.

span.span: Occurs when the workflow instance is unloaded from memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過明確呼叫 或工作流程執行階段引擎根據本身語意的隱含呼叫，可從記憶體中卸載工作流程執行個體。A workflow instance can be unloaded from memory by an explicit call to , or implicitly by the workflow run-time engine according to its own semantics. 例如，工作流程執行階段引擎卸載工作流程執行個體時如果執行個體變成閒置，而且執行階段加入其是`true`。For example, the workflow run-time engine unloads a workflow instance if the instance becomes idle and the runtime has a added for which is `true`. 在成功保存工作流程執行個體的狀態後，但在執行個體於記憶體中失效之前，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發 The workflow run-time engine raises the 事件。 event after the state of the workflow instance has been successfully persisted but before the instance is invalidated in memory. 因此， 事件會發生在 事件之前。Therefore, a event precedes the event. 對於 事件，傳送者會包含 ，而 則包含事件關聯的 。For the event, the sender contains the and contains the associated with the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[耗用事件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352)。For more information about handling events, see [Consuming Events](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157352). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何從工作流程主機使用 功能。The following code example demonstrates how to use functionality from a workflow host. 此程式碼會使 與事件處理常式 (名稱為 `OnWorkflowUnload` 的方法) 產生關聯。The code associates the with an event handler, a method named `OnWorkflowUnload`. 這個程式碼範例屬於[自訂持續性服務範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351)。This code example is part of the [Custom Persistence Service Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=157351).
